      public FrequentFlyer(String accountID, String firstName, String middleName, String lastName, String email, MileBalance mileBalance) throws Exception

      accountID - which is a 12-character long String
      firstName - string first name
      middleName - string middle name
      lastName - string last name
      email - string email
      mileBalance - object consisting of left miles
      Throws:
      Exception - if the user id is not 12 long string

    • transferMiles

      public void transferMiles(Deposit deposit) throws Exception
      Parameters:
      deposit - class deposit that allow transfer miles between two frequent flyer
      Throws:
      Exception - if the sender don't have enough miles after the call, the sender miles balance decease and the recipient increase mile balance
